title: TPACK-Based Peer Assessment Mobile Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social studies content knowledge and digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Strengthening competencies in analyzing social issues and creating digital content using learners' personal smartphones

learning_goals: Development of a mobile learning design plan utilizing knowledge from at least five of the seven TPACK domains
Provision of at least three specific peer feedbacks on colleagues' learning design plans based on peer evaluation criteria
Production of a 5-minute interactive microlearning module incorporating social science content
Revision and improvement of the design plan at least twice through peer evaluation during the instructional design process
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
